nodes.text: Nuna bacon was a type of bacon from the avian nuna. It was served at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant either on its own as a breakfast side dish, costing 3.7 credits for four pieces, or with Anoat oats as part of a Pantoran plate special for 4.7 credits. It was also found in both Shawda Clubb sandwiches and Besh-Leth-Trill sandwiches.
